entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon.
